1.3.10.name: wordpress/encyclopedia
1.3.10.description:
Encyclopedia Lite is a state of the art WordPress encyclopedia / lexicon / glossary / wiki / dictionary plugin. It enables you to create, manage and present a knowledge base. Completely coalesced with your WordPress and fully compatible with all the cool publishing tools you like.

In the Lite Edition of the plugin you can take a look around and you try out everything. On several places in the plugin you will find a notice that this function is included in the Pro Version only. There is no support available for the free Lite Version.

Main features

  • Create, manage and structure your Terms as
  • Encyclopedia, lexicon, glossary, Wiki, dictionary or knowledge base
  • Use
